body.name: Handheld Game for Children, Portable Retro Video Game with 500 Classic FC Games 2.8-Inch Color Screen, Retro Mini Game, Support TV Connection & Two Players

features: 【500 Super Classic FC Games】This mini retro handheld fc games consoles adopts the classic gameboy style. The classic FC game allows you to play 500 games without any advertising or additional costs, including Arcade retro games, puzzles, arcades, shooting, racing, fighting, adventure etc. Each game is classical in your childhood.

【Two Players Play on TV】You can connect retro handheld game console with 3.0-inch screen to the TV, through safe and non-toxic ABS plastic game handle and 118inch AV data cable, so you can easily enjoy lively and exciting video games on the TV's big screen.Note: The game signal can only be selected between the game console and the TV!

【Rechargeable Battery】 Built-in 1020mAh high capacity lithium battery, the mini game console comes with USB cable, charging time is about 1~3 hours, 5~8 hours of continuous game play. When you are on a business trip, traveling,camping, you don't have to worry about running out of power. (Note: Please Tear Off The Insulation Film On The Battery Interface Before Putting The Battery into The Device, and Fully Charge The Battery Before First Use.)

【Portable Handheld Game Console】Compact and lightweight handheld game console, mini body, carry it with you. On the way to work, free time, the best choice for relaxing mood. Play anytime, anywhere, enjoy the fun of train childhood, airplane, camp or travel.

【Perfect Gift for Kids & Adults】The retro handheld game console not only bringing funny game time to children but also waking up wonderful childhood memories to the 80s and 90s adults, as well as releasing their life pressure. It is the perfect gift choice for Birthday Christmas and New year festival moments. If you have any problems during use, please feel free to contact us.
body.description: 80s 90s Retro Toys - Retro Handheld Game Console Handheld Game Console comes with 500 classic games: Puzzle, Action, Racing, Arcade Retro Games, Logic & Math, Sports, Arcade, Shooting, Fighting Games, Strategy, Adventure, Card Games, etc. There is always one game that you like. It will give you a fantastic gaming experience, relieve your stress from life and work, as well as bring back your wonderful childhood memories.Tips for Playing on TV:The red port of the AV cable is responsible for the sound output, and the yellow cable is responsible for the image output, corresponding to the color of the port of the TV. It can only support NTSC TV, and it can display in color, others may be black and white.The correct connection procedure is to connect the AV cable before turning on the power to prevent the IC of the game console from being damaged by static electricity.If the AV interface is rusted, this can cause poor contact. The rust on the TV's AV connector must be removed before using it.Product Specification:Screen: 3.0-InchBuilt-in: 500 gamesLanguages: English and ChineseWorking time: About 3-4 hoursCharging time: About 1-2 hoursBattery: 1020MA lithium-ion rechargeable battery.NOTE:!!!1.The battery interface is covered with a thin insulating film, please peel it off before installing the battery into the device.2. In order to relive childhood memories, the texture of the game screen and the touch of the gamepad have completely restored that era.3. The game console does not have the function of saving game progress; when you exit the game, all progress will be zero.4. You may find some duplicate games in it, because these games are different versions and have different fun. 5.Regarding any questions about the product, we will answer you within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewerName: These did not work at all
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kid and husband loved!
reviews.reviewText: Both my kid and husband loved this. My kid loved it so much he used some of his Christmas money to buy one for a friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of fun
reviews.reviewText: This thing is so light it's amazing. But it's got lots good classic games. Great way to pass the time without killing your phone battery. Can turn the volume all the off if other people are around.. The worst thing is there is no battery indicator. You have know idea when it's full charged or about to die. The screen just gets dim. When a charger is plugged in a red light comes on but that's all it does. I don't know how long the battery will actually last because I never know if I've got it full charged lol. But still definitely worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reminds me of my childhood
reviews.reviewText: I remember playing these games as a kids and now I'm hooked again lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a Christmas gift for my husband. There is definitely not 500 games, as they repeat the same ones. The buttons don't work very well and when you try to plug the game into the TV, the cord is so cheaply made it flickers (in black and white) on and off. Only positive is the battery does last a while and the games it does have are decent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great toy but USB cable broke after 1 week of play
reviews.reviewText: My kids loved playing on this game boy. They were devastated when the USB cable broke after a week of use so they can no longer charge the product. And you can’t use regular batteries with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of retro games to stroll down memory lane
reviews.reviewText: This is a fun little game system for playing all the old video games from an era long past. I liked playing it. For what it offers, I think this is a good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for kids of all ages..
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and play. Took getting used to the menu and select and start buttons but once I got used to it then I had to find the games I wanted to play. Some are there that you would remember from the NES or Gameboy systems but some you look forever and then find a generic name which plays the same. Very fun and can connect to the TV and also allow for 2 players as well. Well worth the price. About same size as the gameboy color too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Brings back memories of my childhood!
reviews.reviewText: This is basically like a mini gameboy from my childhood except it's much smaller and lighter and it's also in colour! There are quite a few games preloaded onto this handheld console but there are also a lot of repeated games. With 500 games loaded on here (including repeats), it may seem to have every game you could think of but there were a lot of interesting games that seemed "made up"? Like for example, there's no such thing as Super Mario Bros 6 (at least I've never heard of it) but the game ends up being a cross between Super Mario Bro and Tiny Toons and it's definitely a playable game but it's just weird. But then you also have the classics that practically all of us have played which is the original Super Mario Bros (and also Super Mario Bros 3) that's also on this console and it plays exactly as I remembered as a kid. Same with Dr. Mario except back then I remember playing it without colour and here there's colour. There are also some newer games such as Angry Birds preloaded on here which was neat. A handheld controller, charging cable, and AV cable are also provided. This would make a fun gift for anyone who grew up in the 80s and 90s as most of the games preloaded on here seem to be from that time. I ended up gifting this to my brother since the gameboy we shared as kids is no longer with us and I thought this would be a nice nostalgic gift for him. He loved it!
